alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 8:47PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Minnesota... Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt upstream snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sauk River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Very low roadways may be impacted from Richmond to St. Cloud; water reaching foundations of a few homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 715 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 6.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 715 PM CDT Thursday was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.0 feet on 06/05/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
